alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hempstead and east central Howard Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corinth, or 8 miles west of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Corinth, Center Point and Muddy Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
